channel.title: iParty X
channel.description:
[center][b]Name of the project:[/b] iParty X
[b]What was the purpose of you choosing allstar over Delta:[/b] Well, I was browsing through the Moparscape Development thread and I found over 18 F2P Remakes, all using Hyperion or Delta. So I thought to myself, why not start on an allstar, considering I have never seen it done before, so I started it right away. I plan on making it into an Rs 06-07 'Look-a-like'. I don't want it to be a complete replica, but I do want the members of this community to know what it was 'based' on.
[b]What I have done:[/b] - Cleaned up client.java a little bit - Added walking Npc's around lumbridge - added the spell book Teleports to the emote tab (Considering it's allstar) - Added cooking - Added smelting - Added thieving - Added woodcutting. (And a bit more, I will edit this when I can think of it)
[b]Note:[/b] They are not all 100%, but they are pretty damn good for an Allstar.
[b]Development Team:[/b] - Me - kickingjamie
[b]Note:[/b] I will need help later on, if you guys would like to help, just shoot me a Pm, I will make a Development Team thread later on tonight.
[b][u]Pictures:[/u][/b] Smelting [img width=500 height=320]http://i54.tinypic.com/r2t01h.jpg[/img] Cooking [img width=488 height=320]http://i52.tinypic.com/mbts3a.jpg[/img] Cooking Sendframe [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2evvoxu.jpg[/img] Thieving in Draynor [img width=496 height=320]http://i53.tinypic.com/211rnzq.jpg[/img] Wood Cutting [img width=485 height=320]http://i56.tinypic.com/2eds03n.jpg[/img] Woodcutting send frame [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/xnhmqo.jpg[/img]
[b]Notice on Thieving:[/b]The thief stalls don't give money, they give items. The reason behind this is because of the economy, I will have some decent ways to make money later on in the development.
[b]Update Log:[/b][code]10/10 - Added Woodcutting SendFrames (kickingjamie) 10/10 - Added Cooking SendFrames (kickingjamie) 10/10 - Finished Woodcutting 100% (Me & kickingjamie) 10/10 - Started on smithing (Me)[/code]
[u][b]More Media Coming soon![/b][/u][/center]

item.title: iParty X
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

iParty X

Pretty sure I specifically told you NOT to do this on a side account, this is a pretty bad blow towards your mains unban.

Read full topic

item.title: iParty X
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Thanks, I will be working hard on this for months to come. Might not get a chance to update this everyday, but I will put it on my to-do list, I will atleast post new updates every other day.

Good, keep us updated as much as you can, I’m willing to support this so that it can go far

Read full topic

item.title: iParty X
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Damn! This is a twist and turn of events, I will be checking on this one!

Read full topic

item.title: iParty X
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Yey something in development that interests me. Good luck, please feel free to private message me if you need any help, I’m more than happy to help with something like this. Can I suggest that you have the smallest amount of commands possible, so for example the “::thief” command could be replaced by a book that you get when you first start. I’m looking forward to seeing what you can do with this.

Read full topic

item.title: iParty X
item.dc:creator: @iParty_X iParty X
item.description:
@iParty_X wrote:

[center]Name of the project:
iParty X

What was the purpose of you choosing allstar over Delta:
Well, I was browsing through the Moparscape Development thread
and I found over 18 F2P Remakes, all using Hyperion or Delta. So I
thought to myself, why not start on an allstar, considering I have never
seen it done before, so I started it right away. I plan on making it into an
Rs 06-07 ‘Look-a-like’. I don’t want it to be a complete replica, but I do want
the members of this community to know what it was ‘based’ on.

What I have done:

  • Cleaned up client.java a little bit
  • Added walking Npc’s around lumbridge
  • added the spell book Teleports to the emote tab (Considering it’s allstar)
  • Added cooking
  • Added smelting
  • Added thieving
  • Added woodcutting.
    (And a bit more, I will edit this when I can think of it)

Note: They are not all 100%, but they are pretty damn good for an Allstar.

Development Team:

  • Me
  • kickingjamie

Note: I will need help later on, if you guys would like to help, just
shoot me a Pm, I will make a Development Team thread later on tonight.

Pictures:
Smelting

Cooking

Cooking Sendframe

Thieving in Draynor

Wood Cutting

Woodcutting send frame

Notice on Thieving:The thief stalls don’t give money, they give items.
The reason behind this is because of the economy, I will have
some decent ways to make money later on in the development.

Update Log:10/10 - Added Woodcutting SendFrames (kickingjamie) 10/10 - Added Cooking SendFrames (kickingjamie) 10/10 - Finished Woodcutting 100% (Me & kickingjamie) 10/10 - Started on smithing (Me)

More Media Coming soon![/center]
